dmca.title: Guardian Media stands sentry against copying again
dmca.body:
1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.guardianmedia.net.au/weddings.htm.

2.	The following material is infringing on the copyright:
Search query: "After filming your wedding, in our studios we transform"
Infringing webpages:
www.digitalstudio.com.au/acatalog/website_design_solutions_corporate_videos_latest.htm
spikemedia.net/acatalog/website_design_solutions_corporate_videos_latest.htm
www.spikegroup.com/solutions/flash_animation_corporate_videos_latest.htm

3.	My name is [private], My email is [private]@guardianmedia.net.au My address is: [private], ETTALONG BEACH, NSW AUSTRALIA 2257

4.	The contact information for the offending website is as follows:
www.digitalstudio.com.au	[private]@digitalstudio.com.an
spikemedia.net	unknown

5.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing webpages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6.	I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
Signed:
[private]
